Class Character

java.lang.Object
src.main.java.characters.Character
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICharacterAction
Direct Known Subclasses:
Blacksmith, ClanChief, Druid, General, Innkeeper, Legionnaire, Lycanthrope, Merchant, Prefect
